text:
This pattern... 
Feels a bit too bold, doesn't it...?

And this one, while the colors match... 
Hmm...?
Haha, it's quite a dilemma, isn't it?

Oh, Producer-san, 
Sorry for making you wait...!

No, not at all. 
Take your time choosing.

I thought I'd feature the hair accessory 
that Chiyuki-san made as the main piece.

I'm having trouble deciding...
I'm sorry about that.

You don't need to apologize so much.  I understand
wanting to showcase the hair accessory beautifully.

But if you keep relying on me, 
you'll keep hesitating forever. 
Let's make a decision soon!
Can I hear your opinion too, Producer-san?
Of course, you can ask me anything.
